name: Frontend Developer with Angular Universal Experience
description:
About:

The #1 fastest-growing private company in the Bay Area is looking for an experienced Frontend Developer for the Growth team. As part of the Growth technology team, you will work closely with the Chief Business Officer, VP of Growth, VP of Marketing, and Sales and Business Development teams to drive exponential growth of new customer acquisition.

The company is a C-level startup that raised $41,500,000 in the latest round with investments coming from respected funds like Lightspeed ventures and Wells Fargo.

Formed back in 2016 by graduates from the University of California and with the top management coming from Upwork and BCG, the company takes pride in their employees' retention rate that is on average 3+years.

This is a fully remote position. No test task is required.

Responsibilities:

  • Building a world-class signup flow to improve marketing & sales productivity, landing page, and signup flow experiments;
  • Designing, building, and evaluating experiments using a data-driven approach;
  • Developing marketing site using Service Side Rendering and headless CMS technologies, maintaining the previous version built on Webflow CMS;
  • Working closely with Engineers, Product Manager, Designers, Data Analysts, and Stakeholders as part of the Agile/Scrum process;
  • Collaborating with other scrum teams to integrate new experimental features with existing operational software.

Requirements:

  • Be the subject matter expert in marketing and growth technology;
  • Angular 10+, ES6, HTML, and CSS;
  • Good understanding of Search Engine Optimization principles;
  • Experience with analytics and marketing tools;
  • Basic+ understanding of HTTP protocol;
  • Unit and e2e testing;
  • Fluent spoken English.

Preferred:

  • Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments;
  • Angular Universal (or similar Server Side Rendering technologies experience);
  • CMS development and integration (headless CMS).
Conditions:
  • Remote work with a distributed team of engineers located across the Americas and Eurasia;
  • Available till 4 pm PST;
  • Weekly wages.
